extracted_playbook.title: Close browser and client after logout
extracted_playbook.description: Close browser and client applications after logging out and remove all locally stored session tokens to reduce risk.

extracted_playbook.title: Update SIMOCODE ES V19
extracted_playbook.description: Update SIMOCODE ES V19 to V19 Update 1 or later version.

extracted_playbook.title: Update SIRIUS Soft Starter ES V19
extracted_playbook.description: Update SIRIUS Soft Starter ES V19 (TIA Portal) to V19 Update 1 or later version.

extracted_playbook.title: Update SIRIUS Safety ES V19
extracted_playbook.description: Update SIRIUS Safety ES V19 (TIA Portal) to V19 Update 1 or later version.

extracted_playbook.title: Update TIA Administrator
extracted_playbook.description: Update TIA Administrator to V3.0.4 or later version.

extracted_playbook.title: Update SIMATIC PCS neo V4.1
extracted_playbook.description: Update SIMATIC PCS neo V4.1 to V4.1 Update 2 or later version.

extracted_playbook.title: Update SIMATIC PCS neo V5.0
extracted_playbook.description: Update SIMATIC PCS neo V5.0 to V5.0 Update 1 or later version.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect network access
extracted_playbook.description: Protect network access to devices with appropriate mechanisms and configure the environment according to Siemens' operational guidelines for industrial security.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize network exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Minimize network exposure for all control system devices and/or systems, ensuring they are not accessible from the internet.

extracted_playbook.title: Locate control system networks behind firewalls
extracted_playbook.description: Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Use secure remote access methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use more secure methods, such as Virtual Private Networks (VPNs). Ensure VPNs are updated to the most recent version available.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform impact analysis and risk assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Perform proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Report suspected malicious activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures and report findings to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect against social engineering attacks
extracted_playbook.description: Do not click web links or open attachments in unsolicited email messages. Refer to resources on avoiding email scams and social engineering attacks.

affected_products: SIRIUS Soft Starter ES V19 (TIA Portal)
